About Our Company

Transforming Spaces with Excellence & Expertise

At RenovaLink, we connect homeowners and contractors with specialized remodeling companies, offering complete solutions in one place. From pools to structural support, we guarantee quality, technical backing, and personalized service.

Our Story

Innovation Meets Excellence

Founded by a certified Florida Professional Engineer, RenovaLink began with a simple yet powerful mission: to provide exceptional remodeling and construction services that transform spaces and exceed expectations.

What started as a vision to bring engineering precision to residential and commercial renovations has evolved into a trusted partnership with hundreds of satisfied clients across Florida.

Today, we're proud to serve communities throughout Broward County and Miami-Dade County, bringing together technical expertise, creative vision, and unwavering commitment to quality.
